title: "Life Expectancy and Population"
---

Population size can shape various aspects of a countryâ€™s development, including the availability of health care resources. This analysis investigates how population size correlates with life expectancy, providing insights into whether larger or smaller populations experience different health outcomes.

```{python}
#| echo: false

import pandas as pd
import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# Load dataset
gapminder = pd.read_csv("gapminder.csv")
```

```{python}
# Create scatter plot
plt.figure(figsize=(8,6))
sns.scatterplot(data=gapminder, x="population_millions", y="life_expectancy")

plt.xscale("log") # Log scale
plt.xlabel("Population")
plt.ylabel("Life Expectancy")
plt.title("Life Expectancy vs Population")

plt.show()
```
